sentences.english: When landscaping around granite, plants are chosen to contract the stone.

sentences.english: The decorations are usually sparse and are only meant to highlight the atmosphere that is being created by the music.

sentences.english: These small games can foil the festive atmosphere of the compotation well.

sentences.english: Another important color association is that related to the holidays.

sentences.english: Accompanied with romanticism accompany the body elements to heighten the plot.

sentences.english: The tops of the hills stood sharply like cruel teeth against the sky.
